Content

- 1. Class quote
- 2. Class Center Image
- 3. Class center
- 4. Class heading
- 5. Styling example code
- 6. Style Font-color via class
- 7. Style Font-size via class

1. Class quote

- Using class "quote" you will get style like below :

- Example Quote
- Example Quote
- Example Quote

2. Class Center Image

- Using class "center" class for the image tag, you will style the image center horizontally
CSS 
//CSS image.center 
img.center {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    width: auto;
}

 
 



 
 





3. Class center 


- We support class center for block element: 



This is example for center class 



CSS


.center {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}










4. Class heading 


- We support class heading like bellow this heading section 






5. Styling example code 


- We support styling example code by: < pre >< code > Writing your code here < / code >< / pre >

Example

const exampleString = "This is a string";
function customTrim(string){
  if(typeof string !== "string") return;
  return string.trim();
}










6. Style Font-color via class 


- We support color bellow :


CSS


.white {
    color: white;
}
.blue {
    color: blue;
}
.green {
    color: green;
}
.yellow {
    color: yellow;
}
.orange {
    color: orange;
}
.pink {
    color: pink;
}
.gray {
    color: gray;
}
.red {
    color: red;
}
.purple {
    color: purple;
}
.navy {
    color: navy;
}









7. Style Font-size via class 


- We support font-size class bellow :



CSS


.fs12 {
    font-size: 12px;
};
.fs13 {
    font-size: 13px;
}
...
.fs30 {
    font-size: 30px;
}
